Class Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Tower
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TowerFour, TowerOne, TowerThree, TowerTwo
    public class Tower
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Towers are placed to defend against enemies. They shoot ammunition that damage the enemies.
    Author:
    (Quinton Mak, Levent Eren, Fatima Yahya)

    • Method Detail

      • addedToWorld

        public void addedToWorld​(greenfoot.World w)
        Overrides:
        addedToWorld in class greenfoot.Actor

      • act

        public void act()
        Every act Towers do 3 things. They detect if they are selected, in order to display their info. They locate an enemy and shoot at it.
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.Actor

      • detectSelect

        public void detectSelect()
        Check if this tower is selected, and if so, display the towers info. They display damage, price to sell, and upgrade cost.

      • isSelected

        public boolean isSelected()
        Get method for if tower is selected
        Returns:
        selected. True if this tower is clicked on/selected and false if not.

      • setSelect

        public void setSelect​(boolean select)
        Mutator method for if tower is selected
        Parameters:
        select - , whether the tower is selected or not.

      • shoot

        public void shoot()
        Shoot the enemy by adding ammunition to the world.

      • findE

        protected void findE()
        Method for locating the target enemy

      • getRadius

        public int getRadius()
        Get method for radius

      • upgrade

        public void upgrade()
        Upgrade method for towers. Increases stats. Increases radius, sell amount, and upgrade cost. Updates damage as well. Displays max level if tower cannot be upgraded further.

      • getUpgradeCost

        public int getUpgradeCost()
        Get method for the tower's cost of upgrade
        Returns:
        upgradeCost, the cost to upgrade the tower's level.

      • getLevel

        public int getLevel()
        Get method for tower's level
        Returns:
        level, the level the tower is at.

      • sell

        public void sell()
        Sell method for towers. Removes Tower and info and increases money.
